grace.util
Class Time

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--grace.util.Time
public class Time
extends java.lang.Object

Currently, this class only implements static utility functions that the lame java.util.Date and Calendar classes do not implement.

mergedDateAndTime

public static java.util.Date mergedDateAndTime(java.util.Date date,
                                               java.util.Date time)
This returns the merge of the given date and time such that the returned result has the given date but the given time.
Parameters:
date - to use for returned result
time - to use for returned result
Returns:
date part of date merged with time part of time
